event.title: Summer sale in Crystal gallery, a personalized gift showroom in Dubai
event.description: During this summer season, a great shopping experience is waiting for you. Crystal Gallery, a leading corporate gifts company Dubai is going to be conducted summer sale. They offer many gift vouchers for every purchase you made. If you wish to present unique gift items, it is a perfect shop that meets your all needs and requirements. You can find varieties of crystal gifts and reflections that are made of precious crystal stones.
event.address: Crystal Gallery LLC P.O. Box 487, 17-26, 533B, Al Shafar Building, Al Aweer Road, Ras Al Khor, Dubai, U. A. E.
